org.drip.analytics.definition

Class DiscountCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.DiscountCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstantForwardRate, CubicForwardRate, HyperbolicTensionForwardRate, LinearForwardRate, PolynomialSplineDF, ZeroCurve

    public abstract class DiscountCurve
extends Serializer
implements Curve
    This class contains the baseline abstract discount curve holder object. It provides the stub functionality for accessing the forward rates, the calibration instruments, calibration measures, calibration quotes, and parameters.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.service.stream.Serializer

        NULL_SER_STRING, VERSION
